name: MatchABlock
description:
Get your fingers ready for a fast paced, one touch, arcade shooting game!

Shoot colored bullets to match the targets before your time runs out.

Be prepared for surprises that will put your abilities to the test as you pass through the levels.

Compete against your friends to finish all 100 levels.

COMING SOON

- More levels.

- More game mechanics.

Comments/Feedback is always appreciated! :)
